admingroup.noroleprovider: There is no Role Provider configured and/or enabled in Web.config!
admingroup.syncinfo: Synchronize information about local groups with EPiServer

categories.deleletereferencewarning: One or more pages refers to the category "{0}" that you are trying to delete.
categories.deleteconfirmmessage: Do you want to delete category "{0}" and all of its subcategories?
categories.delreferenceconfirm: Do you still want to delete this category?
categories.heading: Categories
categories.helpadd: Add category below the selected category. Note that no changes will be made until you click Save.
categories.helpdelete: Delete category. Note that if the category has sub-categories, the sub-categories will be moved up one level.
categories.helpmovedown: Moves the category one step down in the list.
categories.info: Define the categories used by your Web site. These categories will be available in Edit mode for each page under the heading "Categories".

cleanupupload.heading: Delete Unused Files
cleanupupload.info: In Edit Mode, editors can upload files to a folder called "Page Files". These files remain on the server when pages are deleted. Here you can remove unused files stored in "Page Files".

confirmlanguagespecific.heading: Values Will Be DeletedConverting existing content
confirmlanguagespecific.info: Property values will be deleted for pages that exist in languages that are not the original language.

contentmirroring.description: The channels that are defined in the system.
contentmirroring.heading: Mirroring Administration
contentmirroring.info: Defines content channels to mirror content from EPiServer CMS to an external system.
contentmirroring.name: Channel Name

contentmirroringedit.alllanguages: Active (all languages are mirrored to destination with globalization support)
contentmirroringedit.confirmdelete: Are you sure you want to remove the mirroring settings?

contentmirroringedit.name: Name
contentmirroringedit.noglobalizationsupport: Inactive (original language is mirrored to destination without globalization support)
contentmirroringedit.singlelanguage: Only "{0}" is mirrored to destination without globalization support

contentmirroringmapping.deleteallmessage: Are you sure you want to delete all mappings for this channel?
contentmirroringmapping.deletemessage: Are you sure you want to delete this mapping?
contentmirroringmapping.message: This list displays how page and folder IDs are mapped between the source site and the remote site. By deleting a mapping, the target page or folder is disconnected from its source. Subsequent mirroring updates will result in a recreation of the target page or folder and a clean copy of any folder content.
contentmirroringmapping.title: Mirroring Mappings for "{0}"

contentmirroringqueue.deletewarningi0: Are you sure you want to delete changes from the queue?
contentmirroringqueue.deletewarningi1: You must manually apply move and delete operations on the destination site
contentmirroringqueue.deletewarningi2: You must republish updated and created pages
contentmirroringqueue.info: Lists the pages that will be mirrored the next time the mirroring service is run.
contentmirroringqueue.title: Mirroring Queue for Destination "{0}" on "{1}"
contentmirroringqueue.warning: Warning! Pages that are deleted from the package will not be included when the Web site is mirrored. This may cause consequences for future mirroring. Do not click "Delete" if you want all the pages in the package to be included the next time the mirroring service is run.

contentmirroringview.errorsamechannelname: The channel name "{0}" is already used by another channel
contentmirroringview.heading: Destination Overview
contentmirroringview.info: An overview of the destinations that have been defined for this channel.
contentmirroringview.name: Destinations
contentmirroringview.notallowedsourcepage: Mirroring cannot be done from the Root page or Recycle Bin.
contentmirroringview.resetwarning1: If you continue with this action, all pages will appear as created.
contentmirroringview.resetwarning2: This action will cause a loss of any items that have not been mirrored to the destination.
contentmirroringview.settingslocked: The settings for this channel and its destinations are locked, because a mirroring job has already been executed with the current settings. Any following jobs require identical settings in order for mirroring to be carried out correctly. Change the settings by clicking "Reset State" to reset information about previous jobs.
contentmirroringview.title: Destinations for Channel "{0}"

archive.description: Specify whether the archive function is active/inactive and how often pages should be archived. The archive function will move pages with expired stoppublishdate to selected archive folder if specified.

databasejob.schedulecaption: This job should be run every
databasejob.startokmessage: The job started without any problems.

subscription.description: The subscription job sends e-mail to users that subscribe to receive updates in different sections of the Web site.

wastebasket.description: Specify whether the emptying function is active/inactive and how often the Recycle Bin should be emptied. The Recycle Bin job will permanently delete pages older than 30 days from the Recycle Bin.

rebuildurlsegments.description: Replaces the name of Web addresses to build links that reflect the structure for the Web site.
rebuildurlsegments.heading: Replace Page Names in Web Addresses
rebuildurlsegments.rebuildnonempty: Rebuild all page names in Web addresses (overwriting existing links)
rebuildurlsegments.rebuildwarning:
{0} pages do not have a name for the Web address. The Web addresses for these pages
 will be generated with the page's identity, e.g. http://.../10/40 will link to the page.
 We recommend that you rebuild the names for these Web addresses with the tool "Rebuild name
 for Web addresses" before you change the Web addresses to reflect the structure of the Web site.

 Click OK to use Web addresses that reflect the structure of the Web site.

remotesite.heading: Remote Web Sites
remotesite.info: Registered remote Web sites for incoming and outgoing traffic. Access rights for remote sites and whether anonymous sites can connect is configured in web.config.

security.heading: Set Access Rights for Page "{0}"
security.info: Restore access rights in EPiServer CMS for pages that you have, for example, completely removed access to. You can change all rights on all pages.
security.notselectedinfo: The settings for this row will not be affected during Save or Remove
security.notsupportedoperation: The operation is not supported for external pages
security.recursivedeleteconfirm: The settings for the selected rows will be deleted for the marked page and for all the sub pages. Choose OK to continue.
security.recursiveinfo: Choosing Save or Delete with "Apply settings for sub pages" selected will assign or delete access rights for selected rows on marked page and all sub pages
security.recursivereplaceconfirm: If the selected rows have other access rights for the sub pages, these will be overwritten and rows that are not selected will be deleted from all sub pages. Choose OK to continue.
security.recursivesaveconfirm: If the selected rows have other settings for the sub pages, these settings will be overwritten. Choose OK to continue.
security.removeaccessrightstext: Add selected rows and delete unselected rows
security.removeaccessrightstexttooltip: Choosing Save will assign access rights to all selected rows. Unselected rows will be deleted. Are usually used for overwriting old access rights.
security.removeconfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the access rights for the selected rows for the selected page. Choose OK to continue.
security.replaceconfirm: If the selected rows have other settings for the marked page, these settings will be overwritten. The unselected rows will be deleted on marked page. Choose OK to continue.
security.selectedinfo: The settings for this row will be affected during Save or Remove

editpage.creator: Created by
editpage.externallinkcaption: Link to page on another Web site
editpage.externallinkwarning: Note! "Link type" is set to "Link to page on another Web site". This means that content is retrieved from the specified address. "Link type" can be changed under "Edit", "Shortcut/External link".
editpage.fetchdatacaption: Fetch data from page in EPiServer CMS
editpage.fetchdatawarning: Note! "Link type" is set to "Fetch data from page in EPiServer CMS". This means that content is retrieved from another page in EPiServer CMS. "Link type" can be changed under "Edit", "Shortcut/External link".
editpage.mustpublishmasterfirst: The original language ({0}) for this page has not yet been published. The original language must be published before the page can be published in other languages.
editpage.nolinkwarning: Note! "Link type" is set to "No link, only text". This means that no content will be visible under the tab "View" and the page's name in the menu will not be linked. "Link type" can be changed under "Edit", "Shortcut/External link".
editpage.shortcutcaption: Shortcut to page in EPiServer CMS
editpage.shortcutwarning: Note! "Link type" is set to "Shortcut to page in EPiServer CMS". This means that the visitor will be redirected when the page's name is clicked. "Link type" can be changed under "Edit", "Shortcut/External link".

languagesettings.addwarning: Are you sure you want to have your own language settings for this page instead of inheriting the settings from the parent page?
languagesettings.availablelanguagesdescriptionfirst: Pages in this part of the site should be available in the languages below. This means that pages can only be created in and translated to these languages.
languagesettings.availablelanguagesdescriptionsecond: This setting affects the languages that editors will have access to for this part of the site.
languagesettings.deletewarning: Are you sure you want to delete the language settings for this page and inherit the settings from the parent page?
languagesettings.fallbacklanguagesdescriptionfirst: Pages in this part of the site may be made available in a language other than the one selected by the visitor. This means that pages that have not yet been translated and published in the selected language can instead be temporarily displayed in another language.
languagesettings.fallbacklanguagesdescriptionsecond: Please note that this setting may cause mixed languges in navigation and listings, which may be confusing for the visitor.
languagesettings.heading: Language Settings for Page "{0}"
languagesettings.inheritsettings: Inherit settings from the parent page: "{0}"
languagesettings.replacementlanguagesdescriptionfirst: Pages in this part of the site should, in the cases below, be displayed in a language other than the one the visitor has selected. This means that pages that are not available in these languages can instead be displayed in other languages.
languagesettings.replacementlanguagesdescriptionsecond: This setting could, for instance, be used when general information in a specific language should be available to all visitors no matter which language has been selected.

property.name: PageArchiveLink
property.caption: Archive to page
property.help: This page can be archived to a special location when the "Stop publish date" has expired. Specify the page that will be used as the archive.

property.name: PageCategory
property.caption: Category
property.help: Choose the categories you want your page to connect to.

property.name: PageChanged
property.caption: Changed
property.help: Date when the page was marked as changed.

property.name: PageChangedOnPublish
property.caption: Mark page as changed
property.help: The date the page is changed will be updated if this box is selected. This is necessary for the page to be included in subscriptions, for example.

property.name: PageChildOrderRule
property.caption: Sort order
property.help: Defines the order in which children of this page will be displayed.

property.name: PageCreated
property.caption: Created
property.help: Date when the page was created.

property.name: PageDelayedPublish
property.caption: Future publishing
property.help: Select this box to publish this version automatically at the "Start publish" date.

property.name: PageExternalURL
property.caption: Simple address for this page
property.help: Specify the path from the root of your Web site, for example "/products". This page can then be made accessible through a simple address without "?" or any other symbols. The visitor enters www.foretaget.se/products and the page will be displayed.

property.name: PageFrameID
property.caption: Target frame
property.help: Determines how a link will be opened (target in <a href>).

property.name: PageLanguageID
property.caption: Language encoding
property.help: Set language encoding for page if different than default.

property.name: PageLink
property.caption: Page link
property.help: Link to page

property.name: PageLinkURL
property.caption: External link
property.help: This page opens with the content from the external page or document you are linked to.

property.name: PageName
property.caption: Name
property.help: Name of the page, which will be used, for example, as a heading in the menus.

property.name: PagePeerOrder
property.caption: Sort index
property.help: Specify an integer for the index number of this page. By selecting "According to sort index" for the parent of this page, the page with the lowest index will be shown at the top.

property.name: PageShortcutLink
property.caption: Internal shortcut/Fetch data from
property.help: The page opens the content of another page and transfers the visitor to the page in question in the structure. / This page opens the content of another page and remains in the current location in the structure.

property.name: PageShortcutType
property.caption: Link type
property.help: Choose which type of link you want to create.

property.name: PageStartPublish
property.caption: Start publish
property.help: Publish the page from this date. If this field is left empty, the page will be published as soon as you have clicked the Publish button.

property.name: PageStopPublish
property.caption: Stop publish
property.help: Publish the page up to this date. If this field is left empty, you must manually delete the page to stop it from being published.

property.name: PageTargetFrame
property.caption: Target frame
property.help: Determines how a link will be opened (target in <a href>).

property.name: PageTypeName
property.caption: Page Type
property.help: Name of page type.

property.name: PageURLSegment
property.caption: Page name in Web address
property.help: Assign a short name to be used for the page in the Web address

property.name: PageVisibleInMenu
property.caption: Display page in menus
property.help: Select this box if you want to display the page in the menus. If this box is not selected, the page will only be displayed in listings.

property.name: SubscriptionMailBody
property.caption: Introduction text in subscription e-mail
property.help: Enter the text that will be the message body above the list of modified pages sent in the subscription e-mail.

property.name: SubscriptionMailFrom
property.caption: Sender address for subscription e-mail
property.help: E-mail address that will be used as sender for subscription e-mail.

property.name: SubscriptionMailReadMore
property.caption: Link text in the subscription e-mail
property.help: This text will build the link that the user will be able to click on in the subcription e-mail.

property.name: SubscriptionMailSubject
property.caption: Subject for subscription e-mail
property.help: This is the subject field in the subscription e-mail that will be sent to the subscribers.

pagetype.name: SysRecycleBin
pagetype.description: Tree structure for Recycle Bin on the Web site
pagetype.name: Recycle Bin

permissions.clienttools: View and publish pages from Microsoft Office add-in
permissions.editorunlimitedfunctions: All functions available in the Editor
permissions.multifileupload: Allow advanced upload of files using for example drag-and-drop
permissions.pageprovidermove: Allow users to move data/pages between page providers
permissions.webserviceaccess: Allow the user to act as a web service user

report.name: changedpages
report.caption: Changed Pages
report.description: Displays pages that have a changed date within a certain time span.
report.heading: Changed Pages
report.info: This report displays pages that have a changed date within a certain time span. Select a page from the list of report results to open it in Edit mode.

report.name: expiredpages
report.caption: Expired Pages
report.description: Displays pages with stop publish date within a certain time span.
report.heading: Expired Pages
report.info: This report displays pages with stop publish date within a certain time span. Select a page from the list of report results to open it in Edit mode.

report.name: notpublishedpages
report.caption: Not Published Pages
report.description: Displays pages that have not yet been published.
report.heading: Not Published Pages
report.info: This report displays pages that have not yet been published and have a last changed date within a certain time span. Select a page from the list of report results to open it in Edit mode.

report.name: publishedpages
report.caption: Published Pages
report.description: Displays pages published within a certain time span.
report.heading: Published Pages
report.info: This report displays pages published within a certain time span. Select a page from the list of report results to open it in Edit mode.

report.name: simpleaddresses
report.caption: Simple Addresses
report.description: Displays published pages that have a simple address.
report.heading: Simple Addresses
report.info: This report displays published pages that have a simple address. Select a page from the list of report results to open it in Edit mode.

startpage.helpimagetext: A redesign of your work area may make it easier to work with Report Center.
startpage.info:
Do you want to know which pages have been published or changed over a certain period of time? Do you also want to know which of these pages have been changed by you?

EPiServer CMS Report Center makes it easy to quickly find information about your Web site to help you with your everyday work.
